column5: Northumbria’s MSc Economics and Sustainability is for both students with a background in economics who wish to specialise in sustainability, and students from a non-economics background who wish to pursue a career in environmental economics.The study of economics alongside environmental and sustainable issues is an emerging discipline with excellent employment prospects.With the World waking up to the need to address climate change, economics is often at the centre of environmental policy-making.
